We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private DetrendedPriceOscillator _dpo;
// In Initialize()
_dpo = DPO(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_dpo.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Is Ready", _dpo.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Warm Up Period", _dpo.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Current", _dpo.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Name", _dpo.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Samples", _dpo.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.dpo = self.DPO(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.dpo.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Is Ready", self.dpo.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Warm Up Period", self.dpo.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Current", self.dpo.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Name", self.dpo.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DPO Samples", self.dpo.Samples);
}
